name: getNetworkFirmwareUpgradesStagedGroup
description: Get a Staged Upgrade Group from a network

$ul: **assignedDevices**: The devices and Switch Stacks assigned to the Group
**devices**: Data Array of Devices containing the name and serial
**switchStacks**: Data Array of Switch Stacks containing the name and id
**description**: Description of the Staged Upgrade Group
**isDefault**: Boolean indicating the default Group. Any device that does not have a group explicitly assigned will upgrade with this group
**name**: Name of the Staged Upgrade Group
